Trade/Device Name(s): FreeStyle Freedom Lite Blood Glucose Monitoring System
FreeStyle Lite Blood Glucose Test Strips
Instrument(s)/Platform(s): FreeStyle Freedom Lite Blood Glucose Meter
Document Summary: FDA 510(k) summary for FreeStyle Freedom Lite Blood Glucose Monitoring System utilizing coulometric biosensor technology for glucose measurement in capillary whole blood.
Indications for Use Summary: For self-testing by people with diabetes at home to monitor effectiveness of diabetes control by quantitatively measuring glucose in fresh whole blood from finger, upper arm, and palm; not for diagnosis or screening of diabetes or for neonatal use.
